name: Merge Empires
storyline:
It all starts with the fact that a once thriving tribe was attacked by a pack of wild animals, as a result of which the settlers lost all their estates.
To move on, the tribe was forced to choose us as their leader and start over.
From this moment, our shared, endless adventure begins.
Now we have to face ancient animals in each level, and as soon as the player defeats these ancient animals, they will go to the next level. But watch out for a boss encounter, which usually pits the player's tribe against one of the big beasts that destroy the tribe.
you need to Combine buildings to get the highest level buildings and build the strongest armies
summary:
Merge Empires is not a complex colorful arcade game from FuryLion Studio.
The game is made in a cartoon style and is a combination of several unique genres. There is the Merge genre, which is the main game of this game, and then combined with the idle RPG genre, because players also have to defeat enemies and especially defeat giant ancient beasts ready to attack their civilization. In this game offered by FuryLion, players are given the role of the leader of a civilization in ancient times. Their task is to unite the houses, build a colony and develop a civilization so that it becomes the most advanced and largest civilization in the world.
